events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all and I have not used it.
The customer's request for a refund due to an incorrect size has been classified under the 'Refund' cluster for proper handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Michael from the Refunds Team to handle the refund inquiry for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I see you would like to request a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket tag is still intact for us to process your refund efficiently?
Yes, my order number is 548921, and the tag is still attached to the jacket. I have not worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your jacket once you send back the item using our prepaid return label.
That sounds good, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and easy refund process you are providing.
Your refund case is now closed from our side. Please ship the jacket back using the return label, and the refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to check if you have sent the jacket back and to confirm that your refund has been processed without any issues.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully issued. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
